question: What is the purpose of ComfyUI-DARE-LoRA-Merge?
answer: ComfyUI-DARE-LoRA-Merge is an experiment about combining multiple LoRAs with DARE (Disentangled Attention Regularization for Low-Rank Adaptation) to enhance image generation.

question: What are the features of ComfyUI-DARE-LoRA-Merge?
answer: ComfyUI-DARE-LoRA-Merge has features like merging LoRA stacks, saving LoRA, and an experimental lipschitz regularizer.

question: How can one turn off the experimental lipschitz regularizer in ComfyUI-DARE-LoRA-Merge?
answer: To turn off the experimental lipschitz regularizer in ComfyUI-DARE-LoRA-Merge, set the value to -1.

question: Where can one find an example workflow for using ComfyUI-DARE-LoRA-Merge?
answer: An example workflow for using ComfyUI-DARE-LoRA-Merge can be found in the 'assets/dare_lora.json' file.

question: Where can users find applicable LoRAs for ComfyUI-DARE-LoRA-Merge?
answer: Applicable LoRAs for ComfyUI-DARE-LoRA-Merge can be found on civit.ai (https://civitai.com/user/ntc/models) or Hugging Face (https://huggingface.co/ntc-ai).

question: How can users provide feedback or contribute to ComfyUI-DARE-LoRA-Merge?
answer: Users can provide feedback or contribute to ComfyUI-DARE-LoRA-Merge by opening a ticket or messaging the creator on civit, huggingfaces, patreon, or the project's page.

question: How can users support the development of ComfyUI-DARE-LoRA-Merge and access more SDXL LoRAs?
answer: Users can support the development of ComfyUI-DARE-LoRA-Merge and gain access to hundreds of SDXL LoRAs by supporting the creator on Patreon (https://www.patreon.com/NTCAI).
